Data Structures

struct  _call_back
struct  CallBack

Detailed Description

To support timers also outside Application context, SystemTimer defines a generic interface for general purpose application timers.

) 
 

Parameters:
timeout Timeout value in milliseconds.
OnTimer Callback function which is called when the timer expires.
arg User-supplied callback data.
autotimer Set this parameter to TRUE if the timer should automatically restart every time it expires.
